main_definition: Wallpapers refer to printed designs or patterns used as decorative coverings on walls in homes, offices, or other buildings.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A metaphorical term describing the act of covering up problems or avoiding confrontation
meanings_and_examples.example: Instead of addressing their financial issues, they kept putting band-aids on them, like wallpapers.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A collection of images or designs printed to be affixed to walls as decorative elements
meanings_and_examples.example: The vintage floral wallpaper added a touch of elegance and charm to the room.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An exhibition showcasing different designs, patterns, and artwork used for wall coverings
meanings_and_examples.example: The interior design conference featured an impressive collection of contemporary wallpapers from around the world.
